section.name: Download Pluto
section.p: To conserve the bandwidth of the Apache Software Foundation, and improve your download times, all Apache Pluto source and binary distributions have been spread across the Apache mirrored distribution sites.

You are currently using [preferred] as your preferred mirror. If you encounter any problem using it, you can select another mirror location from this list and click on Change:
[if-any http] [for http][http][end] [end] [if-any ftp] [for ftp][ftp][end] [end] [if-any backup] [for backup](BACKUP) [backup][end] [end]
If all mirrors are failing, or you have problems downloading from them, please use one of the ASF primary backup nodes from the list above, or jump directly to our primary distribution site.

subsection.name: Current Release
subsection.p:
To download the most current release, please select your preference below:
DistributionFormatDownload
Binary / Bundled tar/gzip (Unix Platforms) pluto-1.0.1-rc2.tar.gz
Binary / Bundled zip (Windows Platforms) pluto-1.0.1-rc2.zip
Container Libraries tar/gzip (Unix Platforms) pluto-lib-core-1.0.1-rc2.tar.gz
Container Libraries zip (Windows Platforms) pluto-lib-core-1.0.1-rc2.zip
Tools Libraries tar/gzip (Unix Platforms) pluto-lib-tools-1.0.1-rc2.tar.gz
Tools Libraries zip (Windows Platforms) pluto-lib-tools-1.0.1-rc2.zip
Source Distribution tar/gzip (Unix Platforms) pluto-src-1.0.1-rc2.tar.gz
Source Distribution zip (Windows Platforms) pluto-src-1.0.1-rc2.zip

subsection.name: Browse Distribution Archives
subsection.p:
You can browse our distribution archive or download the latest Pluto distribution by clicking on one of the links provided below.
